metadata.name: Tarkwa Above: Lost City
metadata.description:
"Tarkwa Above: Lost City"
3840Ã—2160

The once beautiful beaches of Tarkwa Bay are now a desolate wasteland, with the ocean churning with toxic pollution. In this photograph, we see a lone city building their way through the ruins, the water people discovered new tech to purify and store water. Despite the grimness of the surroundings, there is a glint of hope, a determination to survive and rebuild in this post-apocalyptic world.

Made with Blender + Adobe Photoshop

November, 2022
Lagos, Nigeria
